name: Town
description: A bustling town offers diverse services, markets, and entertainment, making it a hub for regional trade. The larger population provides better security and resources, while the increased activity attracts both opportunity and unwanted attention from authorities or criminals.
atmosphere: Cobblestone streets bustle with merchants, craftspeople, and travelers between timber-framed buildings. Market squares echo with vendor calls and commerce clatter. Rich spices, fresh goods, and opportunity fill the air. Tavern signs creak in the breeze while shop windows display diverse wares.
